divs: Sighting DetailsSo saw more orange lights again, not going to make a detailed report. Been seeing these lights here for 2 years now and not 1 single Mufon person has taken the time to come out here. We see them for days at a time. Probably see them again Sunday Night. Not planes, not venus, not a weather balloon.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around April 2nd 2011
